CustomField.formula:
HYPERLINK( "https://"&IF( CONTAINS(QB_Org_Name__c , "Sandbox Company"), "sandbox." ,"") &"qbo.intuit.com/app/"& CASE( QB_Type__c,
'Bill', "bill?txnId="&RIGHT(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c,(LEN(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c)-FIND('-Bill-', QB_Bill_PO_Id__c) - 5)),
'Purchase Order',"purchaseorder?txnId="&RIGHT(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c,(LEN(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c)-FIND('-PO-', QB_Bill_PO_Id__c)- 3)),
"vendorcredit?txnId="&RIGHT(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c,(LEN(QB_Bill_PO_Id__c)-FIND('-VC-', QB_Bill_PO_Id__c)- 3)) ), "Click Here" )
CustomField.label: See this Bill / PO in QuickBooks
